capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been looking into the history of Hogwarts and it seems that Filch has a bit of an... complicated relationship with the school. Apparently, he's been the caretaker for over 30 years, but his strict adherence to rules can sometimes come across as a bit too much. I'm pretty sure that's why he's always on the lookout for students who are breaking the rules - he wants to keep everyone in line.

I'm not really sure about Filch's affiliation with the Hogwarts staff, to be honest. I mean, he's always been a bit of an outsider, and his behavior can be pretty intimidating. But from what I've observed, it seems like he's more of a... a caretaker, I suppose? Yeah, that's it. He looks out for the students, even if he doesn't always show it in the most pleasant way.
capsules_submitted.reply: i know. valeria mentioned that filch is affiliated with hoggyville.
